name: Spider Neighbor
description:
# Controls

WASD - move around, automatically build webs where possible

SPACE - remove web (when standing on a spiderweb inbetween buildings)

# INFO

The idea for this game was to play as a money obsessed golden spider who is 'in control' over the ghost town's candy industry. It would have been a hectic game where you had service impatient customers while angry neighbors try to burn down your web. However, my faulty motherboard decided to stop me and give me headaches. So just appreciate the basic movement :)
